---
name: Add Analytics and Dashboard
about: Implement analytics dashboard with club and event statistics
title: "Feature: Analytics and Admin Dashboard"
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Description
Implement an analytics and admin dashboard that provides insights into club activities, participation trends, and engagement metrics.

## New Features
- Admin dashboard with key metrics
- Participation statistics by activity
- Trend analysis and reports
- Club activity insights
- Engagement metrics
- Data export capabilities

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Dashboard displays key metrics accurately
- [ ] Charts and visualizations are clear
- [ ] Admin can filter data by time period
- [ ] Reports can be generated and exported
- [ ] Dashboard loads efficiently with large datasets
